name: Notion Expenses Tracker
description: Easily Manage All Subscriptions And Bills In One Convenient Place!Expenses Tracker⭐️ Easily keep track of all your active and canceled expenses⭐️ Keep track of active free trials⭐️ Make payments toward your subscriptions⭐️ Look at overview statistics to see how much you are spending on subscriptionsUpdates(January 2024) Complete Remake "Subscription Tracker" is now Expenses Tracker!Redesigned for ease of use and clarity!Easier viewing of all active bills!More functional management of free trials
features: "Subscription Tracker" is nowExpenses Tracker!; Redesigned for ease of use and clarity!; Easier viewing of all active bills!; More functional management of free trials!; Track physical bills too!; Overview stats are much easier to read!
